content: {"name": "Grand Central Food Program, 51st Street between Park and Lexington Avenues", "alternate_name": "", "description": "\"For a smoother experience, this is a grab-and-go meal site where trucks arrive sometimes earlier or later due to traffic. We recommend arriving 15 minutes before the scheduled time. If the truck is running late, please allow at least 15 minutes from the scheduled arrival time before inquiring.\"\nThe Coalition\u2019s Grand Central Food Program (GCFP) begins each night by providing meals at St. Bartholomew\u2019s Church (\u201cSt. Bart\u2019s\u201d) on 51st Street between Park and Lexington Avenues. From there, three mobile vans leave to provide meals at the stops", "email": "", "url": "https://www.coalitionforthehomeless.org/our-programs/food/grand-central-food-program/grand-central-food-program-routes/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "123 East 51st Street", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10022", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.757371, "longitude": -73.9724766}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 776-2000", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No requirements"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Nightly mobile soup kitchen"}]}
